definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: purity, innocence (cf. BH [[זׇכָה]], also Targum [[דְּכָא]], Syr. dkiy be clean (Ar. d-aka0 is be bright (of fire), acute (of mind), etc.), or Ar. zaka0. be pure, good, Targum [[זְכָא]], Syr. zko0 be pure, innocent; are these forms with [[ז]] secondary? or ancient ‖ ?);—abs. ´[[ז]]: Da 6:13 innocence in God’s sight.
